title: Bug 2529 - [Navigator] Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529 - [Navigator] Open/Close project not always available. Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When I have two projects, P1 and P2, and I select project P2, the option to close the project is available, but the option to open the project is not.
EB: Both the options to open and close the project should be available when a project is selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select project P2.
3. Attempt to close project P2.
